title: ETF Data Analysis
text:
We start by defining the universe of European UCITS ETFs.
Note: The data displayed in this vignette is a subset (Top 5 by AUM) generated during the build process to ensure reproducibility and performance.


Show Code
# The function used to generate the full universe:
get_etf_universe




[1] "Universe data not available in this build."

title: ETF Data Analysis
text:
Metadata (JustETF)
We scraped JustETF for metadata including AUM and TER.


Show Code
# Code used:
fetch_etf_metadata(universe$isin)




[1] "Metadata not available."

title: ETF Data Analysis
text:
Price History (Yahoo Finance)
We fetched daily price history.


Show Code
if (data_loaded && !is.null(history) && requireNamespace("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE)) {
  # Visualize Close Prices with Facets
  history %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = date, y = close, color = ticker)) +
    geom_line() +
    facet_wrap(~ticker, scales = "free_y") +
    labs(title = "ETF Price History (LSE)", y = "Close Price (GBP)") +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(legend.position = "none")
} else {
  print("History plot not available.")
}


[1] "History plot not available."
